paper_abstract: The Lattice Boltzmann simulation of a flow generated by an oscillating plate is conducted in a wide range of frequency variation 0 < omega tau < infinity. The theoretically predicted transition from the viscoelastic (omega tau << 1) Newtonian behavior to purely elastic non-Newtonian regime (omega tau >> 1) has been demonstrated. The relation of the derived solutions to microfluidics (high-frequency micro-resonators) is shown on an example of a "plane oscillator".
paper_title: Lattice Boltzmann simulation of a non-Newtonian oscillating flow in a high-frequency limit
